error.message: Class Drupal\social_share\Plugin\SocialShareLink\FacebookShareLink extends deprecated class Drupal\Core\Plugin\ContextAwarePluginBase. Deprecated in drupal:9.1.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use Drupal\Core\Plugin\ContextAwarePluginTrait instead.

Class Drupal\social_share\Plugin\SocialShareLink\LinkedInShareLink extends deprecated class Drupal\Core\Plugin\ContextAwarePluginBase. Deprecated in drupal:9.1.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use Drupal\Core\Plugin\ContextAwarePluginTrait instead.

Class Drupal\social_share\Plugin\SocialShareLink\MailShareLink extends deprecated class Drupal\Core\Plugin\ContextAwarePluginBase. Deprecated in drupal:9.1.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use Drupal\Core\Plugin\ContextAwarePluginTrait instead.

Class Drupal\social_share\Plugin\SocialShareLink\PinterestShareLink extends deprecated class Drupal\Core\Plugin\ContextAwarePluginBase. Deprecated in drupal:9.1.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use Drupal\Core\Plugin\ContextAwarePluginTrait instead.

Class Drupal\social_share\Plugin\SocialShareLink\TwitterShareLink extends deprecated class Drupal\Core\Plugin\ContextAwarePluginBase. Deprecated in drupal:9.1.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use Drupal\Core\Plugin\ContextAwarePluginTrait instead.
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
